languages.text: Whenever the wearer and allies in a 2-cell radius gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, they also gain an equal amount of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer and allies in a 2-cells radius gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g}, they also gain an equal amount of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
Whenever the wearer and allies in a 2-cell radius gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, they also gain an equal amount of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
Whenever the wearer and allies in a 2-cell radius gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, they also gain an equal amount of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者与2格内的盟友获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}时，也同样会获得等量的临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer and allies in a 2-cell radius gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, they also gain an equal amount of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者与2格内的盟友获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}时，也同样会获得等量的临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。

languages.text: Когда персонаж или его союзники в радиусе 2 клеток получают {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g}, они также получают такое же количество временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer and allies in a 2-cell radius gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, they also gain an equal amount of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж или его союзники в радиусе 2 клеток получают {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментум{/g}, они также получают такое же количество {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.

Когда персонаж или его союзники в радиусе 2 клеток получают {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментум{/g}, они также получают такое же количество {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.

languages.text: 自身と半径2セル以内の味方が{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を得るたびに、彼らは同量の一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}への耐久力を得る。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer and allies in a 2-cell radius gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, they also gain an equal amount of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 自身の半径2セル以内の味方に{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}および同等の一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を付与。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador o sus aliados en un radio de 2 casillas ganen {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}, también reciben la misma cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer and allies in a 2-cell radius gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, they also gain an equal amount of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador o sus aliados en un radio de 2 casillas ganen {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g}, también reciben la misma cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger und Verbündete in einem Radius von 2 Feldern {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} erhalten, erhalten sie außerdem die entsprechende Menge an temporären {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer and allies in a 2-cell radius gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, they also gain an equal amount of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger und Verbündete in einem 2-Zellen-Radius {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g} erhalten, erhalten sie außerdem die entsprechende Menge an temporären {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur et les alliés de celui-ci présents dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de lui obtiennent de la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}, ils bénéficient également d'un nombre égal de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer and allies in a 2-cell radius gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, they also gain an equal amount of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur et les alliés de celui-ci présents dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de lui acquièrent de la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g}, ils bénéficient également d'un nombre égal de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires.

languages.text: Takan kişi ile ona en fazla 2 hücre uzakta bulunan dost birimleri, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} ve aynı miktarda da geçici {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı kazanırlar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer and allies in a 2-cell radius gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, they also gain an equal amount of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
